heading: HB03960
0: AN ACT REQUIRING ALL FRANCHISE GRANTEES USING WIRES AND CABLES IN THE OPERATION OF THEIR BUSINESSES TO RELOCATE ALL WIRES AND CABLES UNDERGROUND OR USE COLORED WIRES AND CABLES TO IDENTIFY THEIR CORPORATION, PROVIDING PENALTIES THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
